00192 QStringList SerialDeviceWatcherPrivate::nativeAvailableDevices() const
00193 {
00194     return m_devicesList;
00195 }
00196 
00197 bool SerialDeviceWatcherPrivate::isEnabled() const
00198 {
00199     return m_enabled;

00208 SerialDeviceWatcher::SerialDeviceWatcher(QObject *parent)
00209     : QObject(parent), d_ptr(new SerialDeviceWatcherPrivate())
00210 {
00211     Q_D(SerialDeviceWatcher);
00212     d->q_ptr = this;
00213 }
00214 
00219 SerialDeviceWatcher::~SerialDeviceWatcher()
00220 {
00221     delete d_ptr;
00222 }
00223 
00234 QStringList SerialDeviceWatcher::devicesAvailable() const
00235 {
00236     return d_func()->nativeAvailableDevices();
00237 }
00238 
00251 void SerialDeviceWatcher::setEnabled(bool enable)
00252 {
00253     d_func()->setEnabled(enable); 
00254 }
00255 
00268 bool SerialDeviceWatcher::isEnabled() const
00269 {
00270     return d_func()->isEnabled();
00271 }
